articles.description: Following its announcement 2 days ago, Telegram has updated the Telegram Desktop app for Windows 10 and 11, taking it to version 3.4.2. The update delivers many of the changes the company announced, including Reactions, Spoilers and new emojis. The update als…
articles.content:
Following its announcement 2 days ago, Telegram has updated the Telegram Desktop app for Windows 10 and 11, taking it to version 3.4.2.

articles.title: Noise ColorFit Caliber fitness tracker with body temperature monitoring launched at Rs 1,999 - India Today
articles.description: The Noise ColorFit Caliber smartwatch is priced at Rs 3,999, but it is currently available for Rs 1,999 as an introductory offer.
